m_szDocSumamry: BMW holds back as rivals steal a marque on fuel cell vehicles South African gold miner says studies ‘have confirmed a robust investment case’ for the Papua New Guinea joint venture with Australian group Newcrest More News BMW holds back as rivals steal a marque on fuel cell vehicles by Michael Taylor,        February 09 2016, 06:33 Michael Taylor BMW holds back as rivals steal a marque on fuel cell vehicles DESPITE all its talk about hydrogen lately, senior BMW officials have now confirmed that the company won’t have a fuel cell-powered car on sale before 2023 at the earliest.
